recipes.title: Homemade Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: A simple and classic Italian pizza with fresh mozzarella, basil, and tomato sauce.
recipes.instructions: In a bowl, mix flour, yeast, salt, warm water, and olive oil to form a dough. Let the dough rise for 1 hour. Roll out the dough on a floured surface. Spread tomato sauce evenly on the dough. Add mozzarella slices on top. Bake at 220°C (430°F) for 12-15 minutes. Garnish with fresh basil and serve hot.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A rich and creamy Roman pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente. In a separate pan, cook pancetta until crisp. In a bowl, whisk eggs and Parmesan. Drain the pasta and quickly mix it with the pancetta and egg-cheese mixture off the heat. Stir quickly to create a creamy sauce. Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

recipes.title: Classic Chicken Caesar Salad
recipes.description: A hearty salad with grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, crunchy croutons, and Caesar dressing.
recipes.instructions: Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper, then grill until fully cooked and golden brown. Slice the chicken into strips. In a large bowl, combine chopped romaine lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan. Add the grilled chicken on top and drizzle with Caesar dressing. Toss gently before serving.
